it-IT.summary: Una Skill gratuita ed open-source per ascoltare la radio.
it-IT.name: EU Radio
it-IT.description: Al momento, questa Skill ha una lista estremamente limitata di stazioni radio disponibili, ma aumenter√† nel corso del tempo.
it-IT.updatesDescription:
La Skill al momento supporta:

- RAI Radio 1
- RAI Radio 2
- RAI Radio 3
- Radiofreccia

en-US.summary: A free, open-source radio Skill for Alexa.
examplePhrases: Alexa, open the EU Radio skill
en-US.name: EU Radio
en-US.description: This Skill will allow you to listen to worldwide radio stations. At the moment, it is extremely limited to a select few, but this list will expand in the near future.
en-US.updatesDescription:
This Skill currently supports the following Italian radio stations: 

- RAI Radio 1
- RAI Radio 2
- RAI Radio 3
- Radiofreccia

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: This Skill currently only supports a few radio stations, but it should respond to the following ones (after saying "play..."): RAI Radio 1, RAI Radio 2, RAI Radio 3 and Radiofreccia (which should also be triggered by saying "Radio Arrow" instead).
